alert.note: Alert for Calabasas and Agoura Hills (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Frost Advisory issued April 03 at 5:06PM PDT until April 04 at 8:00AM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM PDT THIS EVENING... ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 8 AM PDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, northwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. For the Frost Advisory, temperatures as low as 32 will result in frost formation. * WHERE...Calabasas and Agoura Hills. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, until 11 PM PDT this evening. For the Frost Advisory, from 3 AM to 8 AM PDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Frost can damage sensitive plants and harm pets if left unprotected.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.
